parameters.description: Comma-separated chains to exclude from results

totalFee.description: Total protocol fees in USDC wei

paymentOptions.description: Available payment tokens on source chain with deposit amounts

slippage.description: Slippage percentage for swap (0 for USDC)

totalFee.description: Total protocol fees in USDC wei

Array of event types to subscribe to

recipient.description: Recipient wallet address on the destination chain

tokenOut.description: Token address on the destination chain

amount.description: Amount in human-readable format (e.g., "1" for 1 token, "100" for 100 tokens, "1.5" for 1.5 tokens). Set to "0" to allow user to input any amount > 0

paymasterEnabled.description: Whether paymaster is enabled for this client

sender.description: Sender wallet address on the source chain

amount.description: Amount to transfer in human-readable format (e.g., "1" for 1 token, "100" for 100 tokens, "1.5" for 1.5 tokens). Must match session amount if not 0, otherwise must be > 0

refundAddress.description: Refund address on the source chain if intent fails
